name: Crocodile
text: Opponent's Turn Once Per Turn When you return DON!! from your field to the DON!! deck through one of your effects, add 1 DON!! from your DON!! deck as active.

effect.text: When you return DON!! from your field to the DON!! deck through one of your effects, add 1 DON!! from your DON!! deck as active.

meta.notes: The card is a sample. The text 'Opponent's Turn' is printed in a blue box, indicating the timing condition.
